item.title: Can You Spell This Common Word? You'll Never Believe the Answer!
item.description: Introduction We all know that English can be a tricky language to learn. With so many words that sound the same but are spelled differently, it can be difficult to remember all the rules. Today, we’re going to take a look at one of the most commonly misspelled words in the English language: “definitely”. Definition of the Common Word The word “definitely” is an adverb that means “certainly” or “without a doubt”.
